Katya: There was a Trial of Refusal over the motion proposed by Khan 
Bjorn Jorgensson of the Ghost Bears. We held the duel between Ragnar 
and Khan Vlad Ward of the Wolves on the hull of the warship Bloody 
Fang, when a wave hit us.

At those memories, Ragnar trembled a bit.

Ragnar: I remember... the pain... I did not know what it was... The 
energy must have merged us with our mechs. By the way, about Terra, it 
was once the seat of the Star League government, and we Clansmen wish 
only to reinstate it. The invasion of the Inner Sphere had this goal 
in mind. The first clan conquering Terra would become the IlClan, and 
its Khan the IlKhan... And we suspect that, like us, Khan Vlad 
survived and is somewhere. He is an ambitious one and would gladly 
declare himself the IlKhan, even if this is prehistoric earth. This 
would have dire consequences once we get back to our people. You must 
help us!

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> ::Rodimus Prime::
> 
> He was shocked when they transformed to humans.
> 
> "Astonishing, your human."
> 
> He was confused at the term Terra.
> 
> "Terra? Oh, Earth. We call it Earth. I'd be very interesting in 
hearing about how you arrived here and such."
